login.title: Tracearr
login.createAccountHeading: Create your account to get started
login.createAccountDescription: Create an account to manage your media servers
login.signInDescription: Sign in to access your dashboard
login.completeInPopup: Complete sign-in in the popup window
login.jellyfinAdminNote: Must be an administrator on a configured Jellyfin server
login.setupNote: After creating your account, you'll add your Plex or Jellyfin servers from Settings.
login.jellyfinInvalidCredentials: Invalid username or password, or user is not an administrator

dashboard.streamsAppearHere: Active streams will appear here when users start watching

users.title: Users
users.resetTrustScoreConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset the trust score to 100? This action cannot be undone.

userDetail.noSessionsFound: No sessions found for this user.
userDetail.noTerminationsFound: No stream terminations for this user.

history.title: History
history.description: Browse all streaming sessions with powerful filtering
history.deleteSessionsConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete? This action cannot be undone.

library.title: Library
library.description: Top movies and shows on your server
library.noMoviePlays: No movie plays in this period
library.noShowPlays: No TV show plays in this period

activity.title: Activity
activity.description: Play trends, patterns, and streaming behavior
activity.playsVsSessionsDesc: Validated plays vs raw session count

violations.title: Violations
violations.dismissViolationConfirm: Are you sure you want to dismiss this violation? This will remove it from the violation log permanently.
violations.dismissViolationsConfirm: Are you sure you want to dismiss? This will remove them from the violation log permanently and restore associated trust scores.
violations.noViolationsRecorded: No violations have been recorded yet.

detail.noSessions: No sessions associated with this violation

rules.title: Rules
rules.description: Configure detection rules for account sharing and policy violations
rules.createDescription: Configure a new detection rule for your media servers.
rules.deleteRuleConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this rule? This action cannot be undone.
rules.deleteRulesConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete? This action cannot be undone.
rules.createFirstRule: Create your first detection rule to start monitoring for account sharing.
rules.impossibleTravelDesc: Detect when a user streams from locations too far apart in a short time
rules.simultaneousLocationsDesc: Detect when a user streams from multiple distant locations at once
rules.deviceVelocityDesc: Detect when a user connects from too many IPs in a time window
rules.concurrentStreamsDesc: Limit the number of simultaneous streams per user
rules.accountInactivityDesc: Get notified when users have not watched anything for a specified period
rules.maxSpeedDefault: Maximum realistic travel speed. Default: {{value}} {{unit}} (airplane speed)
rules.minDistanceDefault: Minimum distance between locations to trigger. Default: {{value}} {{unit}}
rules.maxIpsDefault: Maximum unique IPs allowed within the time window. Default: 5 IPs in 24 hours
rules.groupByDeviceDesc: Count by device instead of IP. Prevents false positives from VPN, DHCP, or Virtual Channels.
rules.maxStreamsDefault: Maximum simultaneous streams per user. Default: 3
rules.allowlistNote: Streams from any other country will trigger a violation.
rules.inactivityNote: Creates an alert when a user has not watched anything for this period. Checks run hourly.

terminateStream.title: Terminate Stream
terminateStream.messagePlaceholder: e.g., Please don't share your account
terminateStream.messageHint: This message will be shown to them during playback

notFound.heading: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

plex.noServersFoundHint: Make sure you own at least one Plex server
plex.noAccountsLinkedHint: Link a Plex account to add Plex servers to Tracearr.
plex.deleteServersFirst: Delete connected servers first to unlink this account
plex.linkedAccountsDesc: Manage the Plex accounts you can add servers from.
plex.unlinkConfirm: Are you sure you want to unlink this Plex account? You won't be able to add servers from this account until you link it again.

notifications.addAgentDesc: Choose a notification service and configure it.
notifications.noAgentsHint: Add an agent to receive notifications about sharing violations and stream events.
notifications.removeAgentDesc: This will remove {{name}} and disable all its notifications. You can add it back later.
notifications.oneWebhookLimit: Only one webhook agent can be active at a time.
notifications.allAgentsConfigured: All notification agents are already configured.
notifications.noConfigNeeded: No configuration needed for this agent.

mobile.editDisplayNameDesc: Change how this device appears in your device list
